nadīsotasutta
vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso nadiyā sotena ovuyheyya piyarūpasātarūpena.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ nadiyā sotena ovuyheyya piya rūpa sātarūpena

original: Tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito disvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhitaḥ disvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘kiñcāpi kho tvaṁ, ambho purisa, nadiyā sotena ovuyhasi piyarūpasātarūpena, atthi
analyzed: kiñca api kho tva ambho purisa nadiyā sotena ovuyhasi piya rūpa sātarūpena atthi

original: cettha heṭṭhā rahado saūmi sāvaṭṭo sagaho sarakkhaso yaṁ tvaṁ, ambho purisa, rahadaṁ
analyzed: ca ittha heṭṭhā rahadaḥ sa ūmi sa avaṭṭaḥ sa gahaḥ sa rakkhasaḥ yam tva ambho purisa rahada

original: pāpuṇitvā maraṇaṁ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
analyzed: pāpuṇitvā maraṇam vā nigacchasi maraṇa mattam vā dukkhanti

original: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso tassa purisassa saddaṁ sutvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca paṭisotaṁ vāyameyya.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhave purisaḥ tassa purisassa saddam sutvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca paṭisotam vāyameyya

original: Upamā kho me ayaṁ, bhikkhave, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
analyzed: upamā kho me bhikkhave katā atthassa viññāpanāya
ayam ca itthā atthaḥ

original: ‘Piyarūpaṁ sātarūpan’ti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: piya rūpam sāta rūpam ti kho bhikkhave channa itam ajjhattikānam āyatanānam adhivacana

original: ‘Heṭṭhā rahado’ti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: heṭṭhā rahadaḥ ti kho bhikkhave pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam
ūmi bhayanti kho bhikkhave kodha upāyāsassa etam adhivacana

gaha rakkhasā iti kho bhikkhave mātugāmassa etam

original: ‘Hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyāmo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vīriyārambhassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyāmaḥ iti kho bhikkhave vīriya ārambhassa etam adhivacana

original: ‘Cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito’ti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti.
